# CHANGELOG

## v2.0.0

**Breaking changes**

- Custom variables and mixins changes:

| old mixin             | new mixin                                     |
|:----------------------|:----------------------------------------------|
| --box-rounded-shadow  | --cells-skeleton-group-skeleton-group         |
| --bbva-200            | --cells-skeleton-group-item-last-border-color |
| --bbva-white          | --cells-skeleton-group-animate-layer-bg-color |
